thread.title: New Sales & Marketing Executive Assistant Manager for Pullman Kuala Lumpur City Centre Hotel and Residences
thread.title_full: New Sales & Marketing Executive Assistant Manager for Pullman Kuala Lumpur City Centre Hotel and Residences

author: Assignment Editor
title: New Sales & Marketing Executive Assistant Manager for Pullman Kuala Lumpur City Centre Hotel and Residences
text:
New Sales & Marketing Executive Assistant Manager for Pullman Kuala Lumpur City Centre Hotel and Residences   
Oct 15, 2015 eTN   
Gilbert Chai has joined Pullman Kuala Lumpur City Centre as its new Executive Assistant Manager â€“ Sales & Marketing effective October 12, 2015. 
Reporting to General Manager, Gilbert will be responsible in devising strategies for sales and marketing through revenue management to grow opportunities in the respective corporate transient, group, conference services and catering sales areas for the newly-rebranded Pullman Kuala Lumpur City Centre Hotel and Residences. Gilbert has a wealth of experience covering 25 years in the hotel industry. 
Gilbert Chai is a post degree graduate of Business Administration from the National University of Taiwan, Taipei and also has a degree in Hotel Management and Operation studies from the Japan Hotel School, Tokyo. His previous experience includes working with numerous international hotel groups such as Pan Pacific Hotels & Resorts, Shangri-La Hotels & Resorts and Nikko Hotels International; in a similar capacity in various countries.
